name: Spacester!!
description:
Spacester

A Rookie and newbie attempt at making a Space Themed game which I failed miserably.

Controls:

Space for Acceleration/Thrust
A for left
D for Right
(Only one key at a time, If you press Space and A then only Space would respond.)

Level 1:
Don't touch the black bars that you see(You won't die if you touch the box obstacles), Go from one Platform to another

Level 2:
Don't touch anything, Go to the base straight away.

Level 3: 
Well, It is non existent tbh
